A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Hugely entertaining - 2.5 hours zips by. (...but make sure to hit restrooms before movie starts!).  Some plot points don't make a lot of sense but 10 seconds later\, you're whisked into either drop dead gorgeous scenery\, a battle or unexpected interplay between characters\, especially between Rey and Kylo Ren.  For me\, this rates a second (or third) viewing!
